title: What are other bands like Bajofondo, Gotan Project, and Tanghetto? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good answers before me. Yes, these are all considered neotango/nuevo tango groups. If you ever have the opportunity to attend a live concert by any of them, do not hesitate to go. Tanghetto and Otros Aires are wonderful; Bajofondo gives the most unforgettable live performances. I would recommend you seek out a lesser known American alternative ensemble, Mandragora Tango Orchestra. Some other enjoyable, lyrical, eminently danceable neotango songs are: Daniel Garcia Quinteto - a fantastic version of Eleanor Rigby Craig Einhorn - Milonguea Del Ayer Jose Alberto - And I Love Her (a magnificently romantic latin-inflected arrangement that is a special treat on those rare occasions when tango DJ’s deign to play it for us to dance to) Alacran - Reflejo de Luna

To me these are the next gen “new wave” or “nuevo tango” bands. For a while we had a movement called “alternative tango,” using place holders such as Apocalyptica “Nothing Else Matters.” These stood in for the vacuum left after Piazzolla, credited with the birth of “tango nuevo.” In order for any art to survive, it must live and breathe new life. Otherwise Argentine tango would be a “folk dance.”
